site_name: St Mary With St Nicholas Church
description: Details of minimum code for sustainable homes level 4 pursuant of condition 27 of outline planning permission reference PP/2013/2200 dated 18/10/2013 for Redevelopment of site to provide a three storey building with a replacement church and meeting rooms at ground floor level (D1 use), together with 4 x 2 bed flats, and 6 x 1 bed flats at first and second floor level, 1 x 2 storey 4 bed vicarage located in the northeast corner of the site, a two storey terrace containing 2 x 3 bed houses & 1 x 2 bed house in the northern part of the site, and a two storey terrace of 4 x 3 bed houses fronting Federal Road (10 affordable units and 8 private market units), a new vehicular access in the central part of the site, 27 car parking spaces, including 3 disabled bays, refuse bay and landscaping (following the demolition of the existing buildings)
